#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int Sum(int n);
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,sum;
        cin>>n;
        sum=Sum(n);
        cout<<(n%sum)<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}

int Sum(int n)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        sum+=n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
    return(sum);
}
